message.body: Sophieeeeaaa what u doing today?
I have a meeting at 12 to 2. Want to work on our projects then????!!! It'll be so much better if we do. It together
Going to Prudential now. Wanne meet me there afterwards? I only have the ideas on paper. No idea about how to work on them. Would really be great!!!
Prudential, are you SHOPPING? I really should get a little bit more done on my thing before I play.. Our are you working there?
Im still in Brighton actually ans will probably be paying a lot for the hair dresser so changed my mind about going Prudential : )
Haha are you getting your hair blow dried?
Hair did?
Blow dry + bikini wax ! But 15% off for students
Nice... How much they charge for both?
Do I get to see you today? Or do I have to come to Brighton
Where do you wanna meet? And what time are you free? I m on my way back to home now.
Well now I have a meeting at six at the school
Wasnt it til 2 : ( i missed you! And so much to tell. I did such a stupid thing!!!!!
We didn't finish.... Oh tell me!!!
Your first weekend on America!
It good to act like a stupid American
You have about two months until you should wise up
Hahahaha I m not gonna tell you on the phone!!! So when the meeting finishes? And what are these meetings for? Should I also be attending some meetings?
No for a class group project! Come to school work here
Uuuuum, well I am gonna go to home first. Then I ll text you if I ll work at home or not. And if your meeting finishes early I can pick you up from school and we can go out for a drink or a coffee!!!
Yes if I finish this... Did u finish yours already! I'm going to try to get it fine before group meeting
I will be preapering some pdfs with my notes again. I find some ideas but lost in them now. No idea about my mediums etc. What will you be doing for tomorrow?
What time you come to school? Lunch together?
Ceren I wish I'm busy until class at 130. But hey let's get a drink after class Tonight.
I just didn't do any work this weekend and gave two things due today plus appointment this morning
And I hate my idea fork and class
But ceren this weekend should be really good will you come out with me both Friday and sat!
Haha find a lighter!
Found a lighter.
Me2 as soon as we split have fun tonight
Hey ceren!! Me and sky wanted t
To know if you were coming tonight?
No pressure
: ) Derek is working late tonight so he is able to give me a ride. Not even at home yet. So I will stay and continue the readings.
Ohhh ok we missssss u
I miss u guys too!! And have things to talk too!!!! :)
